sense.def: Abbreviated Designation li yang 癧瘍 , pervasion-illness with ulcer Pathological Condition of white macules and dots appearing on the skin in the neck, on the chest, and below the armpits, without itching or pain. Zhu bing yuan hou lun 諸病源候論 31: 人有頸邊、胸前、 掖下自然斑剝，點相連，色微白而圓，亦有烏色者，亦無痛癢，謂之癧 瘍風 , “If someone has macules with interconnected dots at the sides of the neck, on the chest, and below the armpits, that appear to have come by themselves, are white and round, occasionally black, and neither itch nor ache, this is called pervasion-illness with ulcer wind ”.
